mapper.insert:
select accommodation_seq.nextval from dual
insert into accommodation values(#{accommodationNo}, #{accommodationName}, #{accommodationAddress}, #{accommodationImg}, #{accommodationPhone}, #{accommodationDirections}, #{siteNo}, #{ownerNo})
mapper.select: select accommodation_no from accommodation where accommodation_name=#{accommodationName}
select site_no from accommodation where accommodation_no=#{accommodationNo}
select owner_no from accommodation where accommodation_no=#{accommodationNo}

select t2.* from(select rownum rnum, t1.* from (select accommodation_no, accommodation_name, accommodation_address, accommodation_img, accommodation_phone, accommodation_directions, site_no, owner_no from accommodation order by accommodation_no desc)t1)t2 where rnum between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}

select t2.* from(select rownum rnum, t1.* from (select accommodation_no, accommodation_name, accommodation_address, accommodation_img, accommodation_phone, accommodation_directions, site_no, owner_no from accommodation where owner_no=#{ownerNo} order by accommodation_no desc)t1)t2 where rnum between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
